privacyPolicyPage.title: CharHub AI Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.introduction: Welcome to the CharHub AI Privacy Policy ("us", "we", "our"). This policy describes how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your personal information when you use our CharHub AI platform (the "Platform"). By using the Platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.paragraph1: We may collect and process the following types of information about you:

listItem1.title: Information You Provide:
listItem1.subItem1: When you register: Your email address, username (if provided, or auto-generated), password (stored as a hash). Optionally, full name and date of birth.
listItem1.subItem2: When using Social Login (Google/Facebook): We collect your email, name, and profile picture as provided and permitted by the OAuth provider.
listItem1.subItem3: User-Generated Content: Characters you create (name, description, avatar, etc.), assistants, chat conversations (text messages, image prompts), and files you upload (avatars, LoRA training images).
listItem1.subItem4: Preferences: Your settings, such as theme, NSFW content permission, and preferred language.

listItem2.title: Information Collected Automatically:
listItem2.subItem1: Usage Data: Information on how you interact with the Platform, such as features used, frequency, and duration of activities.
listItem2.subItem2: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, device information. (Standard collection for most web services).

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.paragraph1: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
section2.listItem1: To provide and operate the Platform: Authenticate users, allow creation and interaction with characters and assistants, process your requests (such as text, image, and audio generation).
section2.listItem2: To personalize your experience: Adapt content and features to your preferences.
section2.listItem3: For communication: Send important notifications about your account or Platform updates (e.g., email verification - to be implemented).
section2.listItem4: For analysis and improvement: Understand how the Platform is used to enhance our services and develop new features.
section2.listItem5: For security and fraud prevention: Protect the integrity of the Platform.

section3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
section3.paragraph1: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
section3.listItem1: With Third-Party AI Providers: The content of your interactions (such as text and image prompts) is sent to third-party Large Language Model (LLM) APIs and other AI services (e.g., OpenAI, Google, Anthropic, Groq, ComfyUI) to generate responses, images, and audio. We take steps to use these services responsibly, but final processing occurs on these third-party systems.
section3.listItem2: Within Conversations: If you participate in conversations with other users (future functionality) or multiple bots/assistants, the content of those conversations is inherently shared among participants.
section3.listItem3: Legal Obligations: If required by law, subpoena, or other legal process, or if we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, your safety, or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.
section3.listItem4: Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred.

section4.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
section4.paragraph1: We store your data on secure servers. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
section4.paragraph2: Passwords are stored using hashing. Access tokens (JWTs) are used for authentication and expire after a set period.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.paragraph1: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. You may request the deletion of your data as described in Section 7.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
section6.paragraph1: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section6.listItem1: The right to access the information we hold about you.
section6.listItem2: The right to correct inaccurate information.
section6.listItem3: The right to request the deletion of your information.
section6.listItem4: The right to restrict or object to the processing of your information.
section6.paragraph2: You can update some of your profile information directly on the Platform. For other requests, please contact us.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.paragraph1: Our Platform is not intended for children under the age of 14 (or the applicable minimum age in your jurisdiction without parental consent). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section9.paragraph1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date at the top. We recommend you review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

dataDeletionPage.title: CharHub AI Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletionPage.introduction: At CharHub AI, we respect your right to privacy and control over your personal data. This page provides instructions on how you can request the deletion of your data associated with your CharHub AI account, including any data we may have received through your login with third-party providers like Google or Facebook.

section1.title: How to Request Data Deletion
section1.paragraph1: To request the deletion of your account and associated data, please follow the steps below:

step1.textBeforeLink: Send an email to our support address:

section1.step2: In the subject line of the email, please write: "Account Data Deletion Request".

step3.intro: In the body of the email, please include the following information so we can identify your account:
step3.bullet1: The email address associated with your CharHub AI account (the same one you use for direct login or via Google/Facebook).
step3.bullet2: Your CharHub AI username (if you remember it).
step3.bullet3: If you used social login (Google or Facebook), please mention which provider you used.

listItem1.title: Verification:
listItem1.text: We may need to contact you to verify your identity and confirm your request before proceeding with the deletion.

listItem2.title: Processing:
listItem2.text: Upon verification, we will process your deletion request. This typically involves removing your personal information from our active databases. This process may take up to 30 days, though we strive to complete it sooner.

listItem3.title: What Data is Deleted:
listItem3.text: Your user profile (email, name, avatar, etc.), created characters and assistants, chat history, authentication tokens, and any other personal information directly associated with your account.

listItem4.title: Retained Data:
listItem4.text: Some anonymous or aggregated information that does not personally identify you may be retained for analytics and service improvement purposes. Additionally, we may retain certain information if required by law or for legitimate purposes such as security, fraud prevention, or fulfilling our legal obligations. We will inform you if this is the case.

listItem5.title: Data with AI Providers:
listItem5.text: Note that interactions sent to third-party AI models (LLMs) to generate responses may be processed and retained by those providers according to their own privacy policies and terms. Deleting your CharHub AI account does not guarantee deletion of this data from AI provider systems.

section3.title: Removing App Access from Facebook/Google
section3.paragraph1: In addition to requesting data deletion from us, you can also revoke CharHub AI's access directly from your Google or Facebook account settings:

listItem1.linkText: Apps with access to your Google account page

listItem2.instruction: Go to Settings & Privacy > Settings > Apps and Websites, and remove CharHub AI from your list of active apps.

section3.paragraph2: Revoking access on the OAuth provider will prevent CharHub AI from accessing new data from your provider account, but it will not automatically delete data we have already collected. For that, please follow the deletion request instructions above.

section4.title: Contact Us
section4.paragraph1Prefix: If you have any questions about the data deletion process, please contact us at:
